tool_description: An API showing all latest news about COVID-19 around the world.
name: Coronavirus news live
title: Coronavirus news live

api_list.name: Get Individual Covid News
api_list.description: Get news about covid form specific news resource
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://coronavirus-news-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "coronavirus-news-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://coronavirus-news-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "coronavirus-news-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Covid News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all news about covid all over the world.
